verses.verse: And Jacob<WH3290> called<WH7121> unto<WH413> his sons,<WH1121> and said,<WH559> Gather yourselves together,<WH622> that I may tell<WH5046> you that<WH853> which<WH834> shall befall<WH7122> you in the last<WH319> days.<WH3117>
Gather yourselves together,<WH6908> and hear,<WH8085> ye sons<WH1121> of Jacob;<WH3290> and hearken<WH8085> unto<WH413> Israel<WH3478> your father.<WH1>

Reuben, <WH7205> thou<WH859> art my firstborn,<WH1060> my might,<WH3581> and the beginning<WH7225> of my strength,<WH202> the excellency<WH3499> of dignity,<WH7613> and the excellency<WH3499> of power: <WH5794>

Unstable <WH6349> as water,<WH4325> thou shalt not<WH408> excel;<WH3498> because<WH3588> thou wentest up<WH5927> to thy father's<WH1> bed;<WH4904> then<WH227> defiledst<WH2490> thou it: he went up<WH5927> to my couch.<WH3326>
Simeon <WH8095> and Levi<WH3878> are brethren;<WH251> instruments<WH3627> of cruelty<WH2555> are in their habitations.<WH4380>

O my soul,<WH5315> come<WH935> not<WH408> thou into their secret;<WH5475> unto their assembly,<WH6951> mine honor,<WH3519> be not<WH408> thou united:<WH3161> for<WH3588> in their anger<WH639> they slew<WH2026> a man,<WH376> and in their self-will<WH7522> they digged down<WH6131> a wall.<WH7791>

Cursed <WH779> be their anger,<WH639> for<WH3588> it was fierce;<WH5794> and their wrath,<WH5678> for<WH3588> it was cruel:<WH7185> I will divide<WH2505> them in Jacob,<WH3290> and scatter<WH6327> them in Israel.<WH3478>

Judah, <WH3063> thou<WH859> art he whom thy brethren<WH251> shall praise:<WH3034> thy hand<WH3027> shall be in the neck<WH6203> of thine enemies;<WH341> thy father's<WH1> children<WH1121> shall bow down<WH7812> before thee.

Judah <WH3063> is a lion's<WH738> whelp:<WH1482> from the prey,<WH4480> <WH2964> my son,<WH1121> thou art gone up:<WH5927> he stooped down,<WH3766> he couched<WH7257> as a lion,<WH738> and as an old lion;<WH3833> who<WH4310> shall rouse him up?<WH6965>

The scepter<WH7626> shall not<WH3808> depart<WH5493> from Judah,<WH4480> <WH3063> nor a lawgiver<WH2710> from between<WH4480> <WH996> his feet,<WH7272> until<WH5704> <WH3588> Shiloh<WH7886> come;<WH935> and unto him shall the gathering<WH3349> of the people<WH5971> be.

Binding <WH631> his foal<WH5895> unto the vine,<WH1612> and his ass's<WH860> colt<WH1121> unto the choice vine;<WH8321> he washed<WH3526> his garments<WH3830> in wine,<WH3196> and his clothes<WH5497> in the blood<WH1818> of grapes: <WH6025>
His eyes<WH5869> shall be red<WH2447> with wine,<WH4480> <WH3196> and his teeth<WH8127> white<WH3836> with milk.<WH4480> <WH2461>
Zebulun <WH2074> shall dwell<WH7931> at the haven<WH2348> of the sea;<WH3220> and he<WH1931> shall be for a haven<WH2348> of ships;<WH591> and his border<WH3411> shall be unto<WH5921> Zidon.<WH6721>
Issachar <WH3485> is a strong<WH1634> ass<WH2543> couching down<WH7257> between<WH996> two burdens: <WH4942>

And he saw<WH7200> that<WH3588> rest<WH4496> was good,<WH2896> and the land<WH776> that<WH3588> it was pleasant;<WH5276> and bowed<WH5186> his shoulder<WH7926> to bear,<WH5445> and became<WH1961> a servant<WH5647> unto tribute.<WH4522>
Dan <WH1835> shall judge<WH1777> his people,<WH5971> as one<WH259> of the tribes<WH7626> of Israel.<WH3478>

Dan <WH1835> shall be<WH1961> a serpent<WH5175> by<WH5921> the way,<WH1870> an adder<WH8207> in<WH5921> the path,<WH734> that biteth<WH5391> the horse<WH5483> heels,<WH6119> so that his rider<WH7392> shall fall<WH5307> backward.<WH268>
I have waited<WH6960> for thy salvation,<WH3444> O LORD.<WH3068>
Gad, <WH1410> a troop<WH1416> shall overcome<WH1464> him: but he<WH1931> shall overcome<WH1464> at the last.<WH6119>
Out of Asher<WH4480> <WH836> his bread<WH3899> shall be fat,<WH8082> and he<WH1931> shall yield<WH5414> royal<WH4428> dainties.<WH4574>
Naphtali <WH5321> is a hind<WH355> let loose:<WH7971> he giveth<WH5414> goodly<WH8233> words.<WH561>
Joseph <WH3130> is a fruitful<WH6509> bough,<WH1121> even a fruitful<WH6509> bough<WH1121> by<WH5921> a well;<WH5869> whose branches<WH1323> run<WH6805> over<WH5921> the wall: <WH7791>
The archers<WH1167> <WH2671> have sorely grieved<WH4843> him, and shot<WH7232> at him, and hated<WH7852> him:

But his bow<WH7198> abode<WH3427> in strength,<WH386> and the arms<WH2220> of his hands<WH3027> were made strong<WH6339> by the hands<WH4480> <WH3027> of the mighty<WH46> God of Jacob;<WH3290> (from thence<WH4480> <WH8033> is the shepherd,<WH7462> the stone<WH68> of Israel: )<WH3478>

Even by the God<WH4480> <WH410> of thy father,<WH1> who shall help<WH5826> thee; and by the Almighty,<WH7706> who shall bless<WH1288> thee with blessings<WH1293> of heaven<WH8064> above,<WH4480> <WH5920> blessings<WH1293> of the deep<WH8415> that lieth<WH7257> under,<WH8478> blessings<WH1293> of the breasts,<WH7699> and of the womb: <WH7356>

The blessings<WH1293> of thy father<WH1> have prevailed<WH1396> above<WH5921> the blessings<WH1293> of my progenitors<WH2029> unto<WH5704> the utmost bound<WH8379> of the everlasting<WH5769> hills:<WH1389> they shall be<WH1961> on the head<WH7218> of Joseph,<WH3130> and on the crown of the head<WH6936> of him that was separate from<WH5139> his brethren.<WH251>
Benjamin <WH1144> shall ravin<WH2963> as a wolf:<WH2061> in the morning<WH1242> he shall devour<WH398> the prey,<WH5706> and at night<WH6153> he shall divide<WH2505> the spoil.<WH7998>

All <WH3605> these<WH428> are the twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> tribes<WH7626> of Israel:<WH3478> and this<WH2063> is it that<WH834> their father<WH1> spoke<WH1696> unto them, and blessed<WH1288> them; every one<WH376> <WH834> according to his blessing<WH1293> he blessed<WH1288> them.

And he charged<WH6680> them, and said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, I<WH589> am to be gathered<WH622> unto<WH413> my people:<WH5971> bury<WH6912> me with<WH413> my fathers<WH1> in<WH413> the cave<WH4631> that<WH834> is in the field<WH7704> of Ephron<WH6085> the Hittite,<WH2850>

In the cave<WH4631> that<WH834> is in the field<WH7704> of Machpelah,<WH4375> which<WH834> is before<WH5921> <WH6440> Mamre,<WH4471> in the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> which<WH834> Abraham<WH85> bought<WH7069> with<WH854> the field<WH7704> of<WH4480> <WH854> Ephron<WH6085> the Hittite<WH2850> for a possession<WH272> of a burial place.<WH6913>

There <WH8033> they buried<WH6912> <WH853> Abraham<WH85> and Sarah<WH8283> his wife;<WH802> there<WH8033> they buried<WH6912> <WH853> Isaac<WH3327> and Rebekah<WH7259> his wife;<WH802> and there<WH8033> I buried<WH6912> <WH853> Leah.<WH3812>
The purchase<WH4735> of the field<WH7704> and of the cave<WH4631> that<WH834> is therein was from<WH4480> <WH854> the children<WH1121> of Heth.<WH2845>

And when Jacob<WH3290> had made an end<WH3615> of commanding<WH6680> <WH853> his sons,<WH1121> he gathered up<WH622> his feet<WH7272> into<WH413> the bed,<WH4296> and yielded up the ghost,<WH1478> and was gathered<WH622> unto<WH413> his people.<WH5971>
